channel.title: [317] Frozn Tyme First release! 500+ Downloads! 4500+ Views! [Delta]
channel.description:
I decided to make my own server :p didnt take me long to make it.
Its my first release though, so dont post harsh comments plz. Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2f1vxxj6jbxmemn]http://www.mediafire.com/?2f1vxxj6jbxmemn[/url]
Downloads: [s]50[/s] [s]100[/s] [s]250[/s] [s]500[/s] [s]1000[/s] [s]2000[/s] 3500
[b][size=14pt]Frozn Tyme:[/size][/b]
Book of Commands! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymebookofcommands.jpg[/img]
Bosses Interfaces! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymebosses.jpg[/img]
Clan Chat! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymeclanchat.jpg[/img]

Castle Wars! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymecw.jpg[/img]

Home! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymehome-1.jpg[/img]

Overload! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymeoverloads.jpg[/img]
Pest Control! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymepc.jpg[/img]
Pk Point Shop! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymepkshop.jpg[/img]
Portal Room! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/frozntymeportalroom.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Ownedcraft RSPS, post:39, topic:397155”]Hey Guys Just Wondering If Anyone Could Help Me Out So I Downloaded The Source Btw It Works Great Thanks
However My Friend Cannot Connect To Me :eek: Ive Portfowarded Looked For Server And Server = In The Client.Java File And Changed All The Ip’s To Mine But He Still Cant Connect (Plus We Are Using The Official Frozen Tyme Client)
If Anyone Can Help Me I Would Be Very Greatfull. :)[/quote]

I’d love to help but, I can’t get the servers I get online due to port forwarding issues.

Read full topic

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

xxruneryxx:

hey guys how do u make like when u die you lose stuff like other clients?

Only donators, mods, and normal players lose items in my source, but, its somewhere in Client.java in the server files.

harusakura1:

how to change server’s IP?

Go to Gui.java in client files, change those 3 ip’s, in this case, should be 127.0.0.1
